password.create.form.title: Set wallet access password
password.create.form.subtitle: Keystore Lite does not store your password on the server. Once you forget your password, you can only restore your wallet through the backup mnemonic.
Password is too short, should be 2 digits minimum
Password is too long, should be 8 digits maximum
mnemonic.produce.title: Please backup your mnemonic
mnemonic.produce.subtitle: Please copy the mnemonic words on the paper in order and keep them in a safe place, we will confirm on the next screen
mnemonic.produce.warning1: · The mnemonic phrase represents the ownership of your wallet, please do not disclose it to anyone
mnemonic.produce.warning2: · Once the mnemonic phrase is lost, the assets cannot be recovered
mnemonic.produce.warning3: · Do not use screenshots, network transmission methods to backup and save
mnemonic.verify.title: Please confirm your mnemonic
mnemonic.verify.subtitle: Please select each word to ensure it is correct
